texts.name: Waymon
texts.biography: Waymon's homeland are invaded by tricky Redcaps and some Kreegan Demons. He had to become a leader to leprechauns after escaped. Now he becomes the only male hero in Fairy Town.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of Clauricorns and Leprechauns or each level attained after 2nd level.
specialty.tooltip:
{Fairy Enchantresses}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of Clauricorns and Leprechauns.
specialty.name: Clauricorns
